Module pimperium
Package pimperium.players

Class Player

java.lang.Object
pimperium.players.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bot, Human
public abstract class Player extends Object implements Serializable
A player in the game

    • chooseSectorToScore

      public abstract Sector chooseSectorToScore(Set<Sector> scoredSectors, Sector[] sectors)
      Choose the sector where points will be added to players controlling systems
      Parameters:
      scoredSectors - The set of sectors that have already been chosen by other players this round (a sector can't be chosen twice)
      sectors - The full list of sectors
      Returns:
      The sector chosen by the player, different from all sectors already chosen
